QuestData.Title: The Grasp Weakens
QuestData.Description: While the Frozen Throne lies dormant, the grasp that the Lich King once held over the Scourge grows ever-weaker. His grip on a weakling like Devlin Agamand should be weak enough that we can remove it entirely.$B$BSpeak with Shadow Priestess Malia in the manor on the east side of town. She will assist you in the procedure.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Shadow Priestess Malia in Brill and participate in the extraction of Devlin Agamand.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, how unfortunate. Perhaps the Scourge's dominion over Devlin's mind remained too strong. Or perhaps our methods are simply not strong enough. It's also possible that Devlin was too simple-minded to comprehend what we were asking him.
